title: John McCormack - Popular Song & Irish Ballads
description:
John McCormack - Popular Song & Irish Ballads

Rip of original RCA vinyls.  RCA did release a CD version but they seriously over filtered and didn\&#039;t include all of the vinyl material.

The Irish ballads are especially haunting, as is the Old House written by a retiring general.  The Moore songs are beautiful and soulful.  I wish Christy Moore would record some of these before he dies.


Title 1 = Garden Where The Praties Grow

Title 2 = The Harp That Once Through Tara\&#039;s Halls

Title 3 = Terence\&#039;s Farewell To Kathleen

Title 4 = Believe Me If All Those Endearing Young Charms

Title 5 = Green Isle Of Erin

Title 6 = Kerry Dance

Title 7 = O Mary Dear (Londonderry Air)

Title 8 = Star of the County Down

Title 9 = Oft in the Stilly Night

Title 10 = She is Far From the Land

Title 11 = Meeting Of The Waters

Title 12 = Bard Of Armagh

Title 13 = Down by the Sally Gardens

Title 14 = She Moved Thro\&#039; the Fair

Title 15 = Green Bushes

Title 16 = Off To Philadelpia

Title 17 = Bantry Bay

Title 18 = Bless This House

Title 19 = I\&#039;ll Walk Beside You

Title 20 = Drink To Me Only

Title 21 = I Know of Two Bright Eyes

Title 22 = Jeanie with the Light Brown Hair

Title 23 = Lovliest Of Trees

Title 24 = Linden Lea

Title 25 = Passing By

Title 26 = Song To The Seals

Title 27 = Silent Night

Title 28 = So Deep is the Night

Title 29 = O Could I But Express in Song

Title 30 = When You Wish Upon a Star

Title 31 = Little Wooden Head

Title 32 = Little Silver Ring

Title 33 = Silent Noon

Title 34 = Cloths Of Heaven

Title 35 = The Old House


If you download, then SEED.
